1.12.2.1.0.0: Added some negative effects if you sacrifice faeries in the altar. Can be slept off. Release.
1.12.2.1.0.2: Add the ability to add user-created rituals in JSON in the minecraft/genera/rituals folder. Rituals there and in the assets are now registered automatically.
1.12.2.1.0.3: Fix some ItemStack handling, update version, rewrite JSON parsing to allow for multiple ingredients in one ritual.
1.12.2.1.0.4: Fix enclosure bug, flatten glass jar using vanilla bottle, add creative tab.
1.12.2.1.0.5: Fix altar bug, add Ring of Connla.
